problem.markdown:
1. How many equations are required for describing a 2DoF system?
() 1 (x) 2 () 3 () None of these
2. 2DoF system does not contain a damper
() true (x) false
3. Which of the following can be modelled as a 2DoF system ?
(x) Motor Generator System () Wave loading in offshore structure () Wind blowing with high velocity over a skyscraper () None of these
4. 2DoF system has
() 1 Natural Frequency (x) 2 Natural Frequencies () ∞ Natural Frequencies () None of these
problem.p: 1. How many equations are required for describing a 2DoF system?
2. 2DoF system does not contain a damper
3. Which of the following can be modelled as a 2DoF system ?

choicegroup.choice: Wind blowing with high velocity over a skyscraper
